newsitem.title: USA: Olympus Ventures sees no reason for drop.
newsitem.headline: Olympus Ventures sees no reason for drop.

text.p: Olympus Ventures Inc said Friday that there is "no fundamental reason" for the recent drop in its stock.
"We see absolutely no reason for such a radical change in the share price," the company said in a statement.
As of Friday afternoon, the stock price stood at $0.20, down $0.01 on the day.

Olympus Ventures said it is in a better financial position than it was a year ago and has recently introduced a line of clothing that it believes will give the company a boost in its gross profit margin.
The company said that management believes "everything is going better than planned."
On the day, the company's stock hit a low price of $0.18 per share. In the afternoon, it was trading at $0.21 per share. Its high for the year was $5.50 per share.
